description: Jefferson Academy is one of the most outstanding middle schools in Washington, DC. Recently boasting academic gains in both reading and math on the DC CAS, significant increases in partnerships, family engagement, extracurricular options and a rigorous but supportive learning environment, Jefferson is designed to meet the needs of students at all ability and interest levels. Over the next two years, Jefferson will engage in a challenging academic plan to integrate the International Baccalaureate curriculum and an extensive building renovation, making it a school of choice for DC families.
transit: 71 (Georgia Avenue-7th Street Line), V7, V9 (Minnesota Ave-M Street Line)
